DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the abatacept pregnancy registry is to monitor planned and unplanned pregnancies exposed to abatacept, to evaluate the possible teratogenic effect and to follow live born infants for one year after birth.
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Currently pregnant women who agree to the conditions and requirements of the study including the interview schedule, release of medical records, and the physical examination of live born infants Women who come in first contact with the project after prenatal diagnosis of a fetal abnormality
